_comments.openReport: If true, generate and open full HTML coverage report (requires reportgenerator tool).

paths.testProject: Relative path to test project used by TestRunner.
paths.badgesDir: Relative path where SVG coverage badges are written.

_comments.badges: List of output badges. Each entry maps a metric key (line|branch|method) to filename and label.
_comments.colorThresholds: Coverage percentage thresholds used to pick badge colors.
